text: Can anyone help me get started by explaining how i can create a list and only extract or search out the even numbers in that list?
create a function even_only(l) that takes a list of integers as its only argument.

The
function will return a new list containing all (and only) the elements of l which are evenly divisible by 2.
The original list l shall remain unchanged.

For examples, even_only([1, 3, 6, 10, 15, 21, 28]) should return [6, 10, 28], and
even_only([1, 4, 9, 16, 25]) should return [4, 16].
Hint: Start by creating an empty list, and whenever you encounter an even number in l, add it to your list.
At the end, return your list.
Thanks for your tme in explaining :)
